meanings.definition: The state of being connected or joined together.
meanings.sent1: The connectednesses of the puzzle pieces made it easy to complete the picture.
meanings.sent2: The connectednesses between the two ideas helped us understand the concept better.
meanings.sent3: The connectednesses of the socks in the dryer always seem to disappear mysteriously.
meanings.sent4: The connectednesses of the team members was like a well-oiled machine, working seamlessly together.
meanings.sent5: The connectednesses of the vines in the jungle created a dense network that was hard to navigate.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being interconnected or related.
meanings.sent1: The connectednesses of the internet allows us to communicate instantly with people around the world.
meanings.sent2: The connectednesses of the characters in the story made the plot more engaging.
meanings.sent3: The connectednesses of the flavors in the dish created a surprisingly delicious combination.
meanings.sent4: The connectednesses of the stars in the sky formed intricate patterns that fascinated astronomers.
meanings.sent5: The connectednesses of the family members was evident in their unwavering support for each other.
